code: import axios from"axios";import{ORDERS_FETCH}from"./types";export var ordersFetch=function ordersFetch(){return function(dispatch){axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/orders").then(function(res){dispatch({type:ORDERS_FETCH,payload:res.data});});};};export var orderDelete=function orderDelete(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/orders/"+id).then(function(_res){axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/orders").then(function(res){dispatch({type:ORDERS_FETCH,payload:res.data});});});};};
